ProjectTitle: Correlations between blood and allograft gene expression signatures to improve the diagnosis and monitor treatment of kidney transplant rejection.
InitialFeedbackHistory: 29/03/2024 [REDACTED] please move the information about 3rd party agreements storage and sharing to the question about these topics, focus here on documentation, will you use protocols, (e)notebooks, etc? [REDACTED] please note that the UZL ethical committee recommends storage for 25 years which is mandatory if your study is a clinical trial. [REDACTED] is not suitable for long term preservation of data since it is linked a your account which expires when your leave KU [REDACTED] please consult the storage guide for other solutions: https://icts.kuleuven.be/storagewijzer/en
label: good with suggestions
